pr_title: Add vpcid in usage network response

timeline.bodyText: Could this have side effects? You may need to check, or instead add a new method that finds VPC by ID including removed?
timeline.author: rhtyd

replies.bodyText: Can you please tell me why this will have side effects?
replies.author: ravening

replies.bodyText: @ravening it would be better to add new method in ApiDBUtils.java
replies.author: weizhouapache

replies.bodyText: @rhtyd fixed it. added a new function
replies.author: ravening

timeline.message:
Add vpcid in usage network response

Currently vpcid is displayed in listUsageNetworks response.
Add the vpcid so that we can see to which vpc, the network belongs
use new function to get removed
use new function to get removed
